timeline.message:
[#1534] validator generate subcommand move --Xnumber-of-validators to --number-of-validators

Make dev option as standard option as number of validators is a standard use case.

Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem <usman@usmans.info>

Merge remote-tracking branch 'upstream/master' into number_of_validators

Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem <usman@usmans.info>

timeline.bodyText: Seems slightly weird that this is such a specific converter and not just a PositiveIntegerConverter.
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: :) PositiveIntegerConverter has a nice ring to it, let me change to that.
replies.author: usmansaleem

timeline.message:
refactoring type converter class name

Signed-off-by: Usman Saleem <usman@usmans.info>
